data.name: lblTableDescription.Text
data.value: This template allows following Tokens in the Template file:

data.name: lblTemplateContent.Help
data.value: Allows you editing the current template.

data.name: lblTemplateNameCaption.Help
data.value: The template you are currently editing.

data.name: ListAlternator2.Text
data.value: Outputs 0 or 1 depending on items index

data.name: ListAlternator3.Text
data.value: Outputs 0, 1 or 2 depending on items index

data.name: ListAlternator4.Text
data.value: Outputs 0, 1, 2 or 3 depending on items index

data.name: ListAlternator5.Text
data.value: Outputs 0, 1, 2, 3 or 4 depending on items index

data.name: ListCount.Text
data.value: Count of items in the list

data.name: ListIsFirst.Text
data.value: Outputs First if current item is the first one

data.name: ListIsLast.Text
data.value: Outputs Last if current item is the last one

data.name: ListRepeat.Text
data.value: Allows defining the repeating part of the template

data.name: ListToolbar.Text
data.value: Outputs the toolbar to edit list information

data.name: ListIndex1.Text
data.value: Index of the current item + 1 (for numbering lists)

data.name: AppRazor.List
AppTokens.List
data.value: [App:Path]=returns the url to the current app, for integrating scripts, images etc. For example, use as [App:Path]/scripts/knockout.js [App:PhysicalPath]=the physical path, in case you want access to the C:\path for some reason [AppResources:...]=any resource defined in the App - usually used for multilanguage labels like [AppResources:FirstName] [AppSettings:...]=any type of setting defined in the App - usually used for configuration like details-pages [AppSettings:DetailsLink]

data.name: ListRazor.List
ListTokens.List
data.value: [List:Index]=Index of the current item [List:Index1]=Index of the current item + 1 (for numbering lists) [List:Count]=Count of items in the list [List:IsFirst]=Outputs First if current item is the first one [List:IsLast]=Outputs Last if current item is the last one [List:Alternator2]=Outputs 0 or 1 depending on items index [List:Alternator3]=Outputs 0, 1 or 2 depending on items index [List:Alternator4]=Outputs 0, 1, 2 or 3 depending on items index [List:Alternator5]=Outputs 0, 1, 2, 3 or 4 depending on items index [ListContent:Toolbar]=Outputs the toolbar to edit list information <repeat>...</repeat>=Allows defining the repeating part of the template

data.name: ModuleTokens.List
data.value: [Module:Description]=Module Definition Description [Module:EndDate]=Module Display Until Date [Module:Footer]=Module Footer Text [Module:FriendlyName]=Module Definition Name [Module:Header]=Module Header Text [Module:HelpURL]=Module Help URL [Module:IconFile]=Module Path to Icon File [Module:ModuleTitle]=Module Title [Module:PaneName]=Module Name of Pane (where the module resides) [Module:StartDate]=Module Display from Date

data.name: PortalTokens.List
data.value: [Portal:Currency]=Currency String [Portal:Description]=Portal Description [Portal:Email]=Portal Admin Email [Portal:FooterText]=Portal Copyright Text [Portal:HomeDirectory]=Portal Path (relative) of Home Directory [Portal:LogoFile]=Portal Path to Logo File [Portal:PortalName]=Portal Name [Portal:PortalAlias]=Portal URL [Portal:TimeZoneOffset]=Difference in Minutes between Portal Default Time and UTC

data.name: ProfileTokens.List
data.value: [Profile:]=Use any default or custom Profile Property as listed in Profile Property Definition section of Manage User Accounts. Use non-localized Property Name only.

data.name: SystemTokens.List
data.value: [Content:Toolbar]=Toolbar for inline editing with 2sxc. If used inside a <div class="sc-element"> then the toolbar will float

data.name: TabTokens.List
data.value: [Tab:Description]=Page Description Text for Search Engine [Tab:EndDate]=Page Display Until Date [Tab:FullUrl]=Page Full URL [Tab:IconFile]=Page Relative Path to Icon File [Tab:KeyWords]=Page Keywords for Search Engine [Tab:PageHeadText]=Page Header Text [Tab:StartDate]=Page Display from Date [Tab:TabName]=Page Name [Tab:TabPath]=Page Relative Path [Tab:Title]=Page Title (Window Title) [Tab:URL]=Page URL

data.name: TimeTokens.List
data.value: [DateTime:Now]=Current Date and Time [Ticks:Now]=CPU Tick Count for Current Second [Ticks:Today]=CPU Tick Count since Midnight [Ticks:TicksPerDay]=CPU Ticks per Day (for calculations)

data.name: UserTokens.List
data.value: [User:DisplayName]=User’s Display Name [User:Email]=User’s Email Address [User:FirstName]=User’s First Name [User:FullName]=(deprecated) [User:LastName]=User’s Last Name [User:Username]=User’s Login User Name
